settings.heading: About Titan Two
settings.content:
Titan Two is an all-in-one controller adapter enabling cross-platform play and advanced customization. This section is a short summary used in quick popups on the homepage. Full details, images and links are available on this page.

  • Universal controller compatibility
  • Gamepacks and community scripts
  • Windows and macOS support via Gtuner IV

More content coming soon.

settings.title: Converters, Adapters and Crossover Devices
settings.description: Connect your favorite controller to multiple supported gaming systems with Titan Two. This eliminates the need for separate adapters, converters, or crossover devices, offering an affordable and efficient all-in-one solution.

settings.title: Mods, Macros and Combos
settings.description: Activate unique MODs, combos, and macros like rapid-fire, anti-recoil, turbo, drop-shot, and more with ease. Simply load them into your game using drag-and-drop Gamepacks or community scripts â€” no extra tools or hardware required.

settings.title: Keyboard and Mouse on Consoles
settings.description: Enjoy full keyboard and mouse support directly through Titan Two or via Gtuner IV from your PC. This setup gives unmatched customization, letting you play console games with flexibility and precision.

settings.title: FightSticks, Steering Wheels and Joysticks
settings.description: Titan Two supports virtually any HID gaming device, including fight sticks, steering wheels, joysticks, foot pedals, and more. Easily connect and use a wide variety of peripherals without compatibility issues.

settings.title: Full-Featured Scripting Language
settings.description: Create scripts, combos, and macros with millisecond precision. Automate commands for motion sensors, touchpads, and other inputs to enhance gameplay with endless customization possibilities.

settings.title: Programming Software for Windows and Mac
settings.description: Gtuner IV is a cross-platform tool for configuring, updating, and programming Titan Two. It offers powerful features in a user-friendly interface, making customization and device management simple.

settings.title: Processor
settings.description: 32-bit ARM Cortex-M4 CPU running at 168MHz with hardware floating point unit

settings.title: Memory
settings.description: 192KB RAM, 1MB Flash Memory for firmware and scripts storage

settings.title: Connectivity
settings.description: 2x USB 2.0 Type-A ports, 2x USB 2.0 Type-B ports, 1x Mini-USB programming port

settings.title: Power
settings.description: USB powered (5V), no external power supply needed

settings.title: Dimensions
settings.description: 110mm x 55mm x 20mm (L x W x H)

settings.heading: Device Specifications
settings.description: The TITAN TWO is engineered with cutting-edge technology to deliver unmatched performance and reliability.
